original_text: I have stopped the rain, so that your fields and the hills have become dry. Your crops will not grow. There will be no grapes to make wine. You will not have olives to make oil. Nothing will grow in the ground. Your animals will not become fat. People and animals will all hurt. For all your work, you will get nothing.’
korean_text: 내가 이 땅과 산과 곡물과 새 포도주와 기름과 땅의 모든 소산과 사람과 가축과 손으로 수고하는 모든 일에 한재를 들게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: so that your fields and the hills have become dry
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희 밭과 언덕들이 마르게 되었다

sentences.original_text: There will be no grapes to make wine
You will not have olives to make oil
Nothing will grow in the ground
Your animals will not become fat
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 가축들은 살이 찌지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: People and animals will all hurt
For all your work, you will get nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모든 수고에 대해 아무것도 얻지 못할 것이다
